# Draft:Dynasty Sigala

----
Dynasty Sigala is a Dynasty of a Micro State founded by Basileus kai Autokratōr Jake Sigala of the Micronation "Mini Byzantium"
Dynasty founding: Oct 20 2025.
Dynasty members: Mark Sigala,Mark Sigala Jr, Jake Sigala[founder], Emily Sigala, James Sigala, Mark Sigala Jr Jr "Trey".
Ruling Nation: Empire of Mini Byzantium.
Titles: Basileus kai Autokratōr: Jake Sigala.
Despot of the New Morea: Mark Sigala.
Prince of Mini Byzantium: Mark Sigala Jr, James Sigala.
Princess of Mini Byzantium: Emily Sigala.
Famous Ancestors: Charlemagne.
Nationality: American-Mexican[Tejano]
Ethnicity: Italian, Greek and even possibly Norman and Lombard.
Dynastic Religion: Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
Dynastic Languages: English[spoke by every dynasty member.]
Greek[Spoken only by Basileus kai Autokratōr Jake Sigala]
Latin[Also only spoken by Basileus Kai Autokratōr Jake Sigala]
(This  imformation was provided by Basileus kai Autokratōr Jake Sigala himself aka myself.)
